title: What is the Nitto ATP Finals schedule for Wednesday & Thursday?
description: Each Nitto ATP Finals competitor will return to Turin’s Inalpi Arena on Wednesday and Thursday for another taste of the action at the prestigious season finale. Here is the schedule for the next two days at the Nitto ATP Finals. [ATP APP] ORDER OF PLAY - WEDNESDAY, NOVEMBER 13, 2024 CENTRE COURT start 11:30 am [1] Marcelo Arevalo (ESA) / Mate Pavic (CRO) vs [6] Rohan Bopanna (IND) / Matthew Ebden (AUS) Not Before 2:00 pm [3] Carlos Alcaraz (ESP) vs [8] Andrey Rublev Not Before 6:00 pm [4] Simone Bolelli (ITA) / Andrea Vavassori (ITA) vs [8] Kevin Krawietz (GER) / Tim Puetz (GER) Not Before 8:30 pm [2] Alexander Zverev (GER) vs [6] Casper Ruud (NOR) Read Preview: Alcaraz & Rublev meet again in Turin ORDER OF PLAY - THURSDAY, NOVEMBER 14, 2024 CENTRE COURT start 11:30 am [3] Wesley Koolhof (NED) / Nikola Mektic (CRO) vs [7] Harri Heliovaara (FIN) Henry Patten (GBR) Not Before 2:00 pm [5] Taylor Fritz (USA) vs [7] Alex de Minaur (AUS) Not Before 6:00 pm [2] Marcel Granollers (ESP) /Horacio Zeballos (ARG) / [5] Max Purcell (AUS) / Jordan Thompson (AUS) Not Before 8:30 pm [1] Jannik Sinner (ITA) / [4] Daniil Medvedev [NEWSLETTER FORM]
excerpt: Second seed Alexander Zverev will look to build on his impressive start to the 2024 Nitto ATP Finals in a Wednesday evening clash against Casper Ruud in Turin.

Nitto ATP Finals

World No. 2 Zverev leads evening session on Wednesday

November 12, 2024

Corinne Dubreuil/ATP Tour

Alexander Zverev in action at the 2024 Nitto ATP Finals. By ATP Staff

Each Nitto ATP Finals competitor will return to Turin’s Inalpi Arena on Wednesday and Thursday for another taste of the action at the prestigious season finale.

Here is the schedule for the next two days at the Nitto ATP Finals.

ORDER OF PLAY - WEDNESDAY, NOVEMBER 13, 2024
CENTRE COURT start 11:30 am
[1] Marcelo Arevalo (ESA) / Mate Pavic (CRO) vs [6] Rohan Bopanna (IND) / Matthew Ebden (AUS)

Not Before 2:00 pm
[3] Carlos Alcaraz (ESP) vs [8] Andrey Rublev

Not Before 6:00 pm
[4] Simone Bolelli (ITA) / Andrea Vavassori (ITA) vs [8] Kevin Krawietz (GER) / Tim Puetz (GER)

Not Before 8:30 pm
[2] Alexander Zverev (GER) vs [6] Casper Ruud (NOR)

Read Preview: Alcaraz & Rublev meet again in Turin

ORDER OF PLAY - THURSDAY, NOVEMBER 14, 2024
CENTRE COURT start 11:30 am
[3] Wesley Koolhof (NED) / Nikola Mektic (CRO) vs [7] Harri Heliovaara (FIN) Henry Patten (GBR)

Not Before 2:00 pm
[5] Taylor Fritz (USA) vs [7] Alex de Minaur (AUS)

Not Before 6:00 pm
[2] Marcel Granollers (ESP) /Horacio Zeballos (ARG) / [5] Max Purcell (AUS) / Jordan Thompson (AUS)

Not Before 8:30 pm
[1] Jannik Sinner (ITA) / [4] Daniil Medvedev
